AETG.F.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Aeroflot - Russian Airlines
AETG.F.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Aeroflot - Russian Airlines, together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger and cargo air transportation services in Russia and internationally. It also offers other aviation services from Moscow Sheremetyevo Airport. In addition, the company provides airline catering, finance, education, and technical maintenance services, as well as operates a hotel. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a fleet of 359 aircraft. The company was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

It also offers other aviation services from Moscow Sheremetyevo Airport. In addition, the company provides airline catering, finance, education, and technical maintenance services, as well as operates a hotel. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a fleet of 359 aircraft. UTAR.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company UTair Aviation provides passenger and cargo transportation services on domestic and international routes. It offers its services through aircraft and helicopters. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Surgut, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company UTair Aviation operates as a subsidiary of OOO AK-invest.
